member.name: T:Waf.InformationManager.AddressBook.Interfaces.Applications.IAddressBookService
member.summary: Exposes the address book to other modules.

member.name: M:Waf.InformationManager.AddressBook.Interfaces.Applications.IAddressBookService.ShowSelectContactView(System.Object)
member.summary: Shows a view which allows the user to select a contact.
member.returns: The selected contact or null when the user canceled this operation.

member.name: T:Waf.InformationManager.AddressBook.Interfaces.Domain.ContactDto
member.summary: Contains contact informations. This is a data transfer object that can be used to pass information over module boundaries.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
